Reviews.Title: Great entry-level dSLR
Reviews.Author: Alejandro De La Vega
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera refurbished because it was by far cheapest option at the time to get a real SLR. Well, a few months later and I've learned a LOT about photography. It took me a while, but now I see its limitations as well (no bracketing, no autofocus motor). However, I still think it's a great camera for someone that wants to get their feet wet and see if they like photography without too much of an investment. I've taken great pictures with it so that's what counts for me.

Reviews.Title: great dslr
Reviews.Author: rod h.
Reviews.Content: a great dslr upgrade from my Nikon d 40.. compact, easy to use and recommend to anyone looking into photography.

Reviews.Title: Great Used  Body
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: My D40 body was not functioning properly and I couldn't find a place for repair.  Found this used one and the seller is actually in the same state.  It's very clean and everything woirks.  Only negatives were a generic camera strap and a generic battery.

Reviews.Title: THIS CAMERA IS THE BOMB
Reviews.Author: D. Britton "Judy Britton"
Reviews.Content: It is not heavy and cumbersome and it takes fabulous clear photos.  Easy to use and a pleasure to own.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Khellendros "DragonRune"
Reviews.Content: Buying refurbished always seems somewhat chancy to me. This purchase is another reason to not worry about refurbished products. The camera came quickly and in great shape. So far it has been working perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: P. Grosshart "gman"
Reviews.Content: Bought this is enter the SLR digital world. Came in great shape. Wish they put a body cap on it but it was very well packed. Excellent condition and very low shutter count. Loving it.

Reviews.Title: long term advanced amateur
Reviews.Author: george mestas
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to keep my wife from mistreating my camera.  It has limited lens compatibility.  The kit lens does work.  The programming choices are ok. It does what it wa supposed to do do, protect my camera.  I has a lot of noise
